message: Let's be fair and split the money, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Consider that the value decreases for me over time.
I'm willing to split it 60/40 in my favor, since the money is losing value faster for you.  Let's get this done!
Bob, this is already getting tedious.  I'm willing to compromise further, but I need you to meet me halfway.  55/45.
